content:
IActorStateManager IActorStateManager Interface

In this Article

Edit

Represents the interface that state manager for Actor implements.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IActorStateManagerPublic Interface IActorStateManager

Methods summary

AddOrUpdateStateAsync<T>(String, T, Func<String, T, T>, CancellationToken)
AddOrUpdateStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, Func(Of String, T, T), CancellationToken)

Adds an actor state with given state name, if it does not already exist or updates the state with specified state name, if it exists.

AddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
AddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Adds an actor state with given state name.
ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken)
ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken)

Clears all the cached actor states and any operation(s) performed on IActorStateManager since last state save operation.
ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)
ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Checks if an actor state with specified name exists.
GetOrAddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
GetOrAddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Gets an actor state with given state name, if it exists or adds the state with specified state name and value, if it does not exist.

GetStateAsync<T>(String, CancellationToken)
GetStateAsync(Of T)(String, CancellationToken)

Gets an actor state with specified state name.
GetStateNamesAsync(CancellationToken)
GetStateNamesAsync(CancellationToken)

Creates an enumerable of all actor state names for current actor.
RemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)
RemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Removes an actor state with specified state name.
SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken)
SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken)

Saves all the cached state changes (add/update/remove) that were made since last call to SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken) by actor runtime or by user explicitly.
SetStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
SetStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Sets an actor state with given state name to specified value. If an actor state with specified name does not exist, it is added.
TryAddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
TryAddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Attempts to add an actor state with given state name.
TryGetStateAsync<T>(String, CancellationToken)
TryGetStateAsync(Of T)(String, CancellationToken)

Attempts to get an actor state with specified state name.
TryRemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)
TryRemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Attempts to remove an actor state with specified state name.

Methods

  • Edit
    AddOrUpdateStateAsync<T>(String, T, Func<String, T, T>, CancellationToken)
    AddOrUpdateStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, Func(Of String, T, T), CancellationToken)

    Adds an actor state with given state name, if it does not already exist or updates the state with specified state name, if it exists. 

    Task<T> AddOrUpdateStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T addValue, Func<string, T, T> updateValueFactory, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function AddOrUpdateStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, addValue As T, updateValueFactory As Func(Of String, T, T), cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of T)

    Parameters

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to add or update.

    • addValue
      T
      T

      Value of the actor state to add if it does not exist.

    • updateValueFactory
      Func<String, T, T>
      Func(Of String, T, T)

      Factory function to generate value of actor state to update if it exists.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<T>
      Task(Of T)

      A task that represents the asynchronous add/update operation. The value of TResult parameter contains value of actor state that was added/updated.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      The specified state name is null.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

  • Edit
    AddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
    AddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

    Adds an actor state with given state name.

    Task AddStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function AddStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to add.

    • value
      T
      T

      Value of the actor state to add.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous add operation.

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException
      InvalidOperationException

      An actor state with given state name already exists.

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      The specified state name is null.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

  • Edit
    ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken)
    ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken)

    Clears all the cached actor states and any operation(s) performed on IActorStateManager since last state save operation.

    Task ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ClearCacheAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous clear cache operation.

    Remarks

    All the operation(s) performed on IActorStateManager since last save operation are cleared on clearing the cache and will not be included in next save operation.

  • Edit
    ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)
    ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

    Checks if an actor state with specified name exists.

    Task<bool> ContainsStateAsync(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ContainsStateAsync(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of Boolean)

    Parameters

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<Boolean>
      Task(Of Boolean)

      A task that represents the asynchronous check operation. The value of TResult parameter is true if state with specified name exists otherwise false.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      The specified state name is null.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Gets an actor state with given state name, if it exists or adds the state with specified state name and value, if it does not exist.

      CancellationToken

      OperationCanceledException

    SetStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken)
    SetStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

    Sets an actor state with given state name to specified value. If an actor state with specified name does not exist, it is added.

    Task SetStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function SetStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to set.

    • value
      T
      T

      Value of the actor state.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A task that represents the asynchronous set operation.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      The specified state name is null.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

    TryAddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

    Attempts to add an actor state with given state name.

    TryGetStateAsync<T>(String, CancellationToken)
    TryGetStateAsync(Of T)(String, CancellationToken)

    Attempts to get an actor state with specified state name.

    Task<ConditionalValue<T>> TryGetStateAsync<T>(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function TryGetStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of ConditionalValue(Of T))

    Parameters

    • stateName
      String
      String

      Name of the actor state to get.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

    Returns

    • Task<ConditionalValue<T>>
      Task(Of ConditionalValue(Of T))

      A task that represents the asynchronous get operation. The value of TResult parameter contains ConditionalValue<TValue> indicating whether the actor state is present and the value of actor state if it is present.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException
      ArgumentNullException

      The specified state name is null.

    • OperationCanceledException
      OperationCanceledException

      The operation was canceled.

    Remarks

    The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.
